caption:
Celebrating a Big Win for the Planet!
We are overjoyed to share the success of our “Plastic Mukt Shala” campaign, a heartwarming collaboration between Dost Foundation and Dabur India Limited to conduct a mega plastic waste collection drive in government schools in Kheda District of Gujarat. This incredible initiative saw 51,000 enthusiastic students come together to collect and submit an astounding 1,51,000 plastic bottles for recycling! ♻️
These young eco-warriors gathered plastic waste from their schools and surrounding villages. Their dedication and hard work have made a significant impact on the environment, setting a shining example for us all. 🌍✨
This unique campaign has been recognized and certified by the Worldwide Books of Records. A big shoutout to the Dost Foundation team and Dabur family for making this happen. 🏆👏
Let’s continue to work hand in hand towards a cleaner, greener future! 🌱💚

#Dabur #DostFoundation #PlasticMuktShala #GreenInitiative #DaburCSR #CSR #DaburIndia #Sustainability #EnvironmentalAwareness #Recycle
